N.H. Episcopalians elect Mass. priest as new bishop

Rev. A. Robert Hirschfeld was elected to replace V. Gene Robinson, the first openly gay bishop in the history of the Anglican Communion, who is retiring. (Globe, 3:03 p.m.)
